resume.skillmessage: Prgamming languages with plenty of 'Syntactic sugar'

education.description: 3 A Levels – Art/Graphics, Business studies & Information Technology, 1 AS level – General studies.
10 GCSEs - Grades A - C - Sandbach School

work.title: Platform Engineer
work.description: Management & engineering of a large scale data-driven application architecture utilising .Net and SQL server, full-stack development responsible for change management, bug fixes, Git version control & application maintenance, achievements include implementing a landing page available to the entire applications user base and managing an ETL performance and optimisation process within our back end SQL server to monitor and alert on any application errors. Problem identification to owning and driving hot-fixes into front-end implementation using applicable frameworks and service management techniques. Maintenance and incident management with REST API’s critical to service stability.

work.title: Product Specialist
work.description: Managing queries with; SWIFT, H2H XML file support, API solutions, certificate issues, international payments. Deliver high quality projects, onboarding registrations and focusing on high quality implementation for H2H corporates. Conduct usability testing, constructing test implementation plans and translating insights into workable solutions for system releases. Collaborate with product managers and engineering teams.
